pages.text: The Shulker Talisman provides immunity to the levitation effect.  Damage from shulker bullets still happen.  The crafting recipe requires an $(l:fargostalismans:talisman_base_normal)Normal Talisman Base$(/l).  The talisman is used to craft the $(l:fargostalismans:force_of_mystic)Force of Mystic$(/l).
